title: Surprise Eviction In Bigg Boss 13, Shah Rukh Khan Trolled For Wearing Tilak & More From Ent
text:
1. Bigg Boss 13 To Have A Surprise Midnight Eviction Tonight, Siddharth Dey Is Reportedly Out!

In the surprise midnight eviction, it is suspected that Siddhartha Dey will be eliminated.

2. Islam Isn’t So Weak! Shabana Azmi Hits Back After People Troll Shah Rukh Khan For Wearing Tilak

Twitter

Giving it back to the trolls, Shabana Azmi wrote on Twitter, "Appalled to read that@iamsrk Diwali greeting invites wrath of rabid Islamists, gets called a “False Muslim” for sporting a tilak!”FUNDOS get a life! Islam is not so weak that it stands threatened by what is a beautiful Indian custom.Indias beauty is in her GangaJamuni tehzeeb."

3. In A Sweet Gesture, Sonam & Anil Kapoor Treat Paparazzi With Laddoos At Diwali Party, Win Hearts

Photographer Viral Bhayani wrote on his Instagram handle, "The Kapoors were such gracious host last night as they took such good care of the press who came to cover the #diwalibash . First came the sweets, then the drinks, later shezwan rice and finally in the end came the tea in the morning" [sic]

Don't Miss 1.7 K SHARES 1 K SHARES 1.2 K SHARES

4. Karan Johar Performed Diwali Puja In K3G Style and These Pictures & Videos Prove Just That

Karan Johar who organised Diwali Puja at his home invited a lot of stars, particularly the star kids. From Janhvi Kapoor to Sara Ali Khan and Varun Dhawan, it was again a star studded Puja, which was performed in K3G style.

5. Milind Soman Shares He Ran 25 Kms Wearing Dhoti & Chappal, Says 'Don’t Let Anything Stop You'

“Happy Diwali people of the world! Not the most convenient way to run, but it wont stop me 😊😊 longest run in a dhoti so far - 25k… Dont let anything stop you,” he wrote in the caption.
description: From surprise midnight eviction in Bigg Boss 13 and reports suggesting that Siddharth Dey has been kicked out of the house to Shah Rukh Khan getting trolled for sporting tilak on Diwali and being called fake Muslim while Shabana Azmi takes a stand for him and trolls the trolls, here’s all that rocked the world of entertainment.
